transcript:
Customer: Jis vyakti ke aapne call karechen, tini ei muhurte onno call.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Sandeep ji namaskar.
Customer: Namaskar.
Executive: Sandeep ji Sumit Choudhary baat kar raha hun senior manager India Mart head office se.
Customer: Haan boliye sir.
Executive: Haan ji kaise ho sir?
Customer: Haan theek hun.
Executive: Ye aapke side se customer care pe call aaya tha subah se.
Customer: Kya ji?
Executive: Customer care pe call aaya tha aapki side se aaj subah.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Bataye kya issue hua?
Customer: Issue inquiry kafi kam ho raha hai. Maine to baat kiya tha wo baat ho gaya tha na.
Executive: Harjit se baat ho gaya tha aapka?
Customer: Wo hamare jo kya ji?
Executive: Jo aapke account manager hai Harjit unse baat ho gayi thi na aapki?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: To unka manager hi baat kar raha hun actually mein maine unse pucha tha jab aapne customer care pe kiya na to hamare paas mein ek complaint type aa jata hai.
Executive: Hai na to usko ha to isliye wo abhi open tha maine socha ek bar aapse bhi puchu ki kya hai kya hua ya nahi hua kyuki.
Customer: Nahi humne baat kar liya tha sir.
Executive: Saari cheeze clear hai sir?
Customer: Haan sir haan.
Executive: Okay. Aur mujhe ye bataye abhi mujhe aapse aur bhi baat karni hai ek aapka ye buyer supplier bhi khula hua hai.
Customer: Hai to khula hua hai mujhe to call karke bata gaya tha buyer se baat karne ko baat bhi kiya unko bata bhi diya che mahina pehle wo complaint kar raha hai fir bhi bola kuch damage wamej ho to aap usko return kar dijiye hum check karke dusra aapko bhej denge unka whatsapp mein message bhi hai wo screenshot leke maine wo maine to unko whatsapp kiya tha ye jo Subhajit se baat hui thi.
Executive: Achcha Harjit ko.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Main ek bar Harjit se baat karke dikhwa deta hun isko bhi ek second line pe hi rehna aap. Haan Sandeep sir main ye line pe haan sir boliye. Ek second line pe buyer supplier ka wo ye khula hua hai lekin ye bol rahe hain ki humne leke screenshot wagera sab de diya tha to abhi buyer ki side se koi dikkat nahi hai na sir?
Customer: Buyer buyer ka wo dikkat matlab dekhiye buyer bol raha hai ki main aapko maal de dunga ye jo maal aapke waha se aaya hai mujhe paisa refund kar dijiye to sir paisa refund karne ka koi policy nahi hai kuch defect hai to wo change hoga paisa refund karne ka koi policy nahi hai sir.
Executive: Ye cheez aapne us time pe bhi unko aware kara kya tha jab machine ye to ha ye to ye to unko jo invoice mila tha usme to terms condition mein sab likha tha sir.
Customer: Haan to theek hai isme koi main ek bar ye dikhwa le raha hun pehle.
Executive: Ye bol rahe hain ki buyer paisa mang raha hai wapas jabki hum paisa humne matlab usme invoice mein likha hua hai ki refund policy jo damage hai wo sahi karwa ke de de.
Executive: Main ek bar aage dikhwa leta hun us cheez ko bhi Sandeep ji koi issue nahi hai sir.
Customer: Sir mujhe thoda kam hai sir nikalna hai sir.
Executive: Koi baat nahi ek kam kijiye. Haan aap ek kam kijiye Chandra Yadav se baat ho gayi thi aapki Chandra Yadav?
Customer: Chandra Yadav kaun hai?
Executive: Krishna Chandra Yadav India Mart se phone kiya hoga aapke paas 17 tarikh ko. Haan unhone ek bar phone kisi ne kiya tha maine mujhe jo bola tha ki aap ek bar customer se baat kar lijiye to maine customer ko call kiya tha unko bola aapko agar kuch damage hai pehli baat to aap che mahine baad complaint kar rahe ho to agar kuch problem hai to aap usko transport mein bhej bhijwa dijiye hum wo check karke uske according naya maal aapko bhej denge ye phone mein bhi bola unke whatsapp mein bhi message karke bola unka thoda alag sa planning hai theek hai unka planning hai unka wo chahte hain ki main paisa refund kar du theek hai aap ek kam kijiye ki abhi aapke paas mein fir ye jo tha complaint ka close kar raha hun aapke paas mein ek feedback jayega mail pe satisfied not satisfied ka hai na wo basically aapke account manager feedback jata hai subah aapne customer care pe jo call kiya tha na to uska ek feedback jayega aapke paas mein ki hamara discussion aapse ho gaya tha discussion sahi tha ya nahi tha usme nahi tha to wo satisfied not satisfied ke liye jata hai to wo basically jaise meri baat hui hai mere discussion pe aur aapke jo account manager hai unke discussion ke liye jayega.
Customer: Hmm. Theek hai to usko aap satisfied mark kar dijiyega aur kuch issue hai to mujhe batayega. Issue ye hai filhal mera inquiry bahut kam aa raha hai to subah maine unko bataya theek hai to abhi main sun thoda busy hun sir mujhe ek jagah nikalna hai theek hai kam ke silsile mein koi baat nahi kal kis time ke aas pass aap free ho mujhe bataye 10 minute ke liye main us time aapko call kar lunga apne number se. Matlab kis regarding call karni hai sir? Jo inquiry wagera ki aur ye sari cheeze hai ek bar ye to maine unko bataya sir aapko unhone video call mein bhi humne unse baat ki sir. Mera discussion ho gaya hai but ek bar fir bhi check kar lete hain isliye main aapse bol raha hun free time kabhi nikal ke 10 minute ka aap ab kal 9:30 baje call kariyega ek bar. Theek hai kal main aapko 9:30 10 ke beech mein call kar lunga aapko theek hai na theek hai sir abhi wo mail pe aayega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Inquiry is very low.

- Buyer asking for a refund.



Resolution:

- Executive explained refund policy.

- Executive will check with Harjit about buyer issue.

- Executive will call back to discuss inquiry issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back tomorrow at 9:30 AM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, account manager, inquiry

seller_categories.mcat_name: Use And Throw Pen Making Machine
